body_html:
It seems something wrong with the order of parameters.
Modify it like that:

loss = tf.reduce_mean(tf.nn.nce_loss(weights=nce_weights,
biases=nce_biases,
inputs=embed,
labels=train_labels,
num_sampled=num_sampled,
num_classes=vocabulary_size))
body_text:
It seems something wrong with the order of parameters.
Modify it like that:
loss = tf.reduce_mean(tf.nn.nce_loss(weights=nce_weights,
biases=nce_biases,
inputs=embed,
labels=train_labels,
num_sampled=num_sampled,

body:
It seems something wrong with the order of parameters.
Modify it like that:
```
loss = tf.reduce_mean(tf.nn.nce_loss(weights=nce_weights,
biases=nce_biases,
inputs=embed,
labels=train_labels,
num_sampled=num_sampled,
num_classes=vocabulary_size))
```
